name: Thai Garlic Pepper Pork recipe (Moo Gratiem)
description: Quick, easy, and delicious! This Thai garlic pepper pork recipe (Moo Gratiem) is ready in just 15 minutes, making it a perfect choice for a family meal.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a non-stick wok or skillet over medium-high heat and add oil. Add minced garlic and chopped coriander root, black pepper, and stir-fry for about 20 seconds or until garlic is fragrant and turns golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Add your pork slices and cook until they are about 80% done.
recipeInstructions.name: Add your pork slices and cook until they are about 80% done.

recipeInstructions.text: Add oyster sauce, light soy sauce, seasoning powder, white sugar, and dark soy sauce. Continue to stir-fry until the pork is fully cooked, making sure each slice is well-coated in the sauce. Serve immediately with rice.
